description: Create a database where the processed nifty images are stored.

required.-i: Path to the directory where the nifty database exists.
required.-o: Path to the directory where the processed database is going to be saved.

optional.-std: The CT study that is going to be processed e.g -c SPECT-CT. Default is SPECT-CT
optional.-rsr: The study volume which will give the physical space reference for the images of the other study to be resampled on. Default is CT
